lines.text: She has the face of Buddha and the heart of a scorpian
Good or bad, it's all playacting. If you act well, you can fool other people; if you do it badly, you can only fool yourself, and when you can't even fool yourself, you just can fool the ghosts.
Rich man? If you marry a rich man, you will only be his concubine.
Let me be a concubine. Isn't that the fate of a woman?

[losing her cool]
So you're the fourth mistress!
[Yan'er rudely pulls the water bowl away from Songlian and puts clothes in it]
Yes! I am the fourth mistress. Bring my suitcase inside please.
